# Benzodiazepines

Benzodiazepine overdose is common and typically only severe when complicated by:

* Co-ingestion of CNS depressant
* Pulmonary or cardiac disease
* Extremes of age

Typically:

* Drowsiness
* Dysarthria
* Ataxia
* Nystagmus


Occasionally:

* Paradoxical agitation
* Confusion
